headline: Offline-Resilient Stage Timing for Professionals
subheadline: Sync your timer, cue light, and pedal — even when Wi-Fi fails.

hero_secondary.label: Overview
hero_secondary.title: Professional Timing, Simplified
hero_secondary.description: StageBox gives you all the power and polish of a modern SaaS app, but it works offline, reliably and instantly. No cloud dependencies, no complicated setup, just smooth local synchronization you can trust every time.

sections.title: Why StageBox?
sections.subtitle: All the Benefits of SaaS Without Internet Dependency
sections.text: StageBox delivers the convenience, control, and design you would expect from a premium cloud app, but with the reliability of local hardware. It runs entirely offline, syncing your devices perfectly even when WiFi drops.

comparison_points.title: Offline Operation
comparison_points.description: Traditional systems require constant internet connectivity. StageBox works completely offline with local network sync.

comparison_points.title: Zero Latency
comparison_points.description: Cloud systems introduce lag and delays. StageBox provides instant synchronization across all devices.

comparison_points.title: Simple Setup
comparison_points.description: Complex systems need IT support and configuration. StageBox connects in seconds with zero configuration.

comparison_points.title: Reliable Performance
comparison_points.description: Internet-dependent systems fail when Wi-Fi drops. StageBox keeps running no matter what.

comparison_points.title: Modular Design
comparison_points.description: Traditional systems are rigid and expensive. StageBox adapts to your exact needs with modular components.

comparison_points.title: Professional Grade
comparison_points.description: Consumer solutions aren't built for touring. StageBox is engineered for the demands of professional production.

sections.label: Features
sections.title: Built for Professionals
sections.subtitle: Everything you need for professional stage timing
bullets: Clock Local Network Sync — Keep all devices perfectly aligned without internet.
Sliders Modular Control — Combine timer, cue light, and foot pedal as needed.
Battery Portable & Efficient — Compact hardware powered by a single 5V source.
Smartphone Simple App Control — Adjust timing and cues from your phone or tablet.
Settings Built for Pros — Rugged design for touring, broadcast, and stage work.

sections.label: How It Works
sections.title: Simple Setup, Instant Sync
sections.text: StageBox acts as your local hub. Connect your devices via Wi-Fi or Ethernet, launch the controller app, and you're instantly in sync. No cloud sign-in. No lag. No dropped connections. Truly turnkey!

items.question: Is this available now?
items.answer: We're finalizing our prototype and building a small early-access batch. Sign up to be notified when orders open.

items.question: Do I need internet to use it?
items.answer: No. That's the point — StageBox runs a local network that connects your controller, timer, and cue devices offline.

items.question: Can I integrate existing Elgato or DSAN gear?
items.answer: Yes. We're designing StageBox to communicate via standard protocols for cue lights and controller pads.

items.question: Will I be charged for pre-ordering?
items.answer: Not yet. We're only collecting interest to prioritize early production units.
